data.message: Since there is literally no way to get in contact with anybody from Facebook, my last resort is this page. I need a representative to contact me immediately. There are unauthorized charges on my bank account from Facebook and I need this problem resolved NOW. I've submitted numerous reports and complaints and have heard nothing back. This is ridiculous.

replies.message: Sorry to hear about this, Mike. We recommend that you review the detailed breakdown of your ad charges as described here: http://bit.ly/2tWO5Gi. If you have additional questions about your charges, you can contact the billing team through this form: http://bit.ly/2vYeYLp. -Ashley
